fields.title: Link Title

fields.name: linktitle

fields.title: Summary
fields.description: Displayed when paginated or in a list and as page description
fields.name: summary

fields.title: Weight
fields.description: Determines order for pages; lower weight first
fields.name: weight

fields.title: Platen
fields.description: These options override site-wide settings for this page. Don't specify a value if you want to inherit the site defaults.
fields.name: Platen

fields.title: Flatten section in site menu
fields.description: Applicable to section pages (_index.md) only. Causes this section to display as a flat list without indenting.
fields.name: FlattenSection

fields.title: Collapse section in site menu
fields.description: Applicable to section pages (_index.md) only. Causes this section to display as a collapsible entry. When collapsed, child pages are hidden.
fields.name: CollapseSection
